I've seen what happens to kids who grow up with constant boundaries and rules - they become anxious, people-pleasing adults who can't make decisions without asking permission. My daughter will never be like that because she's growing up FREE.

This conversation is over. You're just another adult who thinks you know better than a child's own wisdom. I'll find support elsewhere - from people who actually understand child liberation, not people who want to psychoanalyze my parenting choices!
